summary: We are seeking an experienced Android developer to design, build, and maintain native Android applications. You will translate product requirements into high-quality, user-friendly apps.
responsibilities: Design and develop Android applications using Kotlin and Android Studio.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers and backend developers to implement new features.
Integrate APIs, databases, and external services into apps.
Optimize app performance, troubleshoot bugs, and maintain code quality.
Deploy apps to Google Play Store and ensure compliance with Android guidelines.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
Proficient in Kotlin and/or Java; familiarity with Android SDK.
Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and data storage.
Good problem-solving skills and ability to work in a team.

summary: Join our team as a Front-End Developer to create responsive, interactive web applications using modern web technologies.
responsibilities: Develop responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks like React or Vue.

qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.

summary: We are looking for a QA Engineer to ensure the quality and reliability of our software products by designing and executing test plans.
responsibilities: Develop and execute manual and automated test cases for web and mobile applications.
Identify, report, and track software defects and inconsistencies.
Collaborate with developers and product managers to ensure software quality.

qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
Experience with QA tools and frameworks like Selenium, Appium, or JUnit.
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
Good understanding of SDLC and QA best practices.
